properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, Jesus, Jesus! Sweetest Name on earth, How can I, a sinner, Come to know its worth?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh! the sinful sorrow, Oh! the strangest shame, That I saw no beauty In that sacred Name.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Never felt the sweetness! Never knew the grace, Never saw the love-pain In that wounded face!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Never found the mystery In that simple word— Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, Savior, Lover, Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I have seen the glory Of His tender face, I have felt with wonder Thrills of holy grace.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus! Jesus! Jesus! Loved me in my shame. Oh! the joy and rapture Of that sacred Name.{/lang-eng}
